ยง 15-2131. Reports.
 1. The board of any river regulating district created hereunder shall
annually, as of such date as the department may provide, submit to it a
written report, which shall contain:
 a. An exhibit of the personnel of the board, and all of the employees
and persons connected with the board;
 b. A financial statement, showing fully and clearly the finances of
the district, the amounts and dates of maturity of all bonds, notes and
certificates of indebtedness, the amounts of money received, and from
what sources, and amounts of money paid and purposes for which same were
paid;
 c. A statement of any petitions received by the board and the action
taken thereon;
 d. A descriptive statement of the work done during the previous year;
and
 e. A statement of the condition of reservoirs and the results secured
by the operation thereof in each case.
 2. In addition to the matters outlined above the board shall report to
the department such other matters as it shall deem proper or the
department shall require.
